data.title: Tom Cruise: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Tom Cruise: Check out the list of all Tom Cruise movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Tom Cruise news on Times of India.
data.text:
BTS photos of Tom Cruise performing a mid-air stunt for 'Mission: Impossible 8' take the internet by storm - See inside

etimes.in / Jul 17, 2024, 22:30 (IST)

During 'Mission: Impossible 8' filming in Switzerland, action star Tom Cruise executes daring mid-air stunts shown in viral Daily Mail and Twitter photos. His collaboration with director Christopher McQuarrie, praised by Shea Whigham, involves meticulous planning. Cruise maintains secrecy. The high-octane stunts promise an adventure-packed film, thrilling fans, reminiscent of the 2018 helicopter scene.

When Tom Cruise 'completely knocked' out Rob Lowe

IANS / Jul 17, 2024, 16:42 (IST)

Actor Rob Lowe has revealed that Hollywood star and "competitive" Tom Cruise, with whom he starred in the 1983 crime thriller 'The Outsiders', knocked him out during an impromptu session of sparring, a form of training common to many combat sports including kickboxing.

Stephen Oyoung joins Mission: Impossible 8 Cast

etimes.in / Jul 16, 2024, 12:35 (IST)

​Stephen Oyoung, known for his roles in ‘Twisters’ and Marvel's ‘Spider-Man,’ has been announced as a new cast member for the upcoming ‘Mission: Impossible 8.’ Although details about his role remain unknown, his addition has generated excitement among fans of the long-running action franchise. ‘Mission: Impossible 8’ will continue the storyline from 2023's ‘Mission: Impossible — Dead Reckoning Part One.’ In this film, Ethan Hunt, played by Tom Cruise, confronts one of his most personal enemies

Akshay Kumar defends his work ethic amid rumors of rushing through film projects

etimes.in / Jul 15, 2024, 10:49 (IST)

In an interview, Akshay Kumar addressed commitment rumors surrounding 'Samrat Prithviraj,' comparing his dedication to Tom Cruise's work on 'Mission Impossible.' He highlighted flexibility in shooting schedules, addressed views on his efficiency amid recent box office results, and discussed ongoing projects like 'Sarfira,' emphasizing a focus on delivering compelling performances and high-quality content for audiences.

Taha Shah Badussha on meeting Tom Cruise: Speaking to him felt unreal (Exclusive)

TNN / Jul 12, 2024, 11:00 (IST)

Actor Taha Shah Badussha met Hollywood superstar Tom Cruise in London, describing it as a pinch-me moment. Taha expressed admiration for Tom, calling him his inspiration. The interaction left Taha feeling motivated and encouraged, creating a lasting memory for him.

Taha Shah Badussha shares an unforgettable moment with Tom Cruise at Cannes

etimes.in / Jul 11, 2024, 08:09 (IST)

Bollywood actor Taha Shah met Hollywood superstar Tom Cruise at Cannes. Known for 'Heeramandi' and films like 'Luv Ka The End', 'Baar Baar Dekho', and 'Gippi', Taha shared this encounter on Instagram. The meeting took place at the ‘Twisters’ premiere. Celebrities including Vardhan Puri and Malini Aggarwal celebrated this 'Pinch me!' moment.

Simon Pegg reveals exciting details about 'Mission: Impossible 8 - dead reckoning Part 2'

etimes.in / Jul 08, 2024, 19:57 (IST)

Simon Pegg, who has played Benji Dunn since ‘MSimon Pegg, who has played Benji Dunn since ‘Mission: Impossible 3’ in 2006, recently shared exciting news about the progress of ‘Mission: Impossible 8’ on Instagram. Pegg's update has fans buzzing with anticipation for the new film. The Mission: Impossible series, which has been thrilling audiences for nearly 30 years, is set to continue with ‘Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part 2.

Nicole Kidman talks about 'beautiful' film costume she wishes she had kept

IANS / Jul 06, 2024, 11:45 (IST)

Kidman wore the stunning two-piece ensemble, which featured a fitted, embellished bustier and a pink feathered train. It was selected by the film's co-costume designers, Catherine Martin and Angus Strathie. The actress also mentioned regretting not keeping the glasses her character Alice Harford wore in the 1999 thriller 'Eyes Wide Shut'.

Tom Cruise and Simon Pegg enjoy Coldplay's Glastonbury headline performance

etimes.in / Jun 30, 2024, 17:25 (IST)

Tom Cruise, Hollywood’s evergreen actor, seems to have a newfound love for live music concerts. Just a week after attending Taylor Swift's concert in London, Cruise was seen at the 2024 Glastonbury Festival. He was spotted having a great time with his Mission: Impossible co-star, Simon Pegg, while watching Coldplay headline the Pyramid Stage on June 29, 2024. Cruise and Pegg were photographed together ahead of Coldplay’s performance at Worthy Farm in Pilton

Tom Cruise spends quality time with son Connor in London

ANI / Jun 30, 2024, 11:31 (IST)

Connor leads a quiet life in Clearwater, deeply involved in deep-sea fishing and his Scientology community, while occasionally sharing glimpses of his outdoor pursuits like golfing and fishing on social media.

Ajmal Ameer says Allu Sirish resembled Tom Cruise during the 'Buddy' trailer launch event

etimes.in / Jun 26, 2024, 15:30 (IST)

The upcoming fantasy action film 'Buddy', starring Allu Sirish and Gayatri Bharadwaj, hits theaters on July 26. Directed by Sam Anton, the film features Ajmal Ameer as the antagonist. With its gripping trailer and unique storyline, 'Buddy' promises thrilling action and captivating moments. The film features Gayathri Bharadwaj as the female lead.

Rashmika Mandanna shares inspirational video highlighting hard work and success featuring Yash, Virat Kholi, Cristiano Ronaldo and more

etimes.in / Jun 26, 2024, 13:04 (IST)

Rashmika Mandanna, one of the industry's most successful actors, recently shared an inspiring video on Instagram featuring stars like Virat Kohli and Yash discussing the importance of hard work. This gesture is significant given her past controversial comment about Yash in 2017, which had caused a stir on social media.

Russia bots target Paris Olympics with deepfake Tom Cruise video

NYT News Service / Jun 05, 2024, 08:14 (IST)

Russia, facing a ban on its athletes competing under the national flag at the Summer Olympics, has directed its anger towards the Games and the host city, Paris. According to a Sunday report by Microsoft, Russian propagandists have produced an hour-long documentary, fabricated news reports, and even impersonated French and US intelligence agencies. Their objective is to disseminate fake warnings that advise people against attending the Games.

After Brad Pitt, Tom Cruise's daughter, Suri Cruise drops last name as she graduates High School

etimes.in / Jun 23, 2024, 14:47 (IST)

Suri Cruise, daughter of Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes, graduates from LaGuardia High School. She drops 'Cruise' from her name, listed as 'Suri Noelle'. Reports suggest estrangement between Suri and Tom after his divorce from Katie in 2012.

Prince William, Tom Cruise, Ashton Kutcher leave internet in splits in VIRAL video dancing to Taylor Swift's 'Shake It Off' - WATCH

etimes.in / Jun 23, 2024, 12:25 (IST)

Prince William danced to Taylor Swift's 'Shake It Off' at the Eras Tour at Wembley Stadium, London, with his kids, going viral on social media. The internet can't seem to get enough of the video of the Royal getting his groove on. The same applied to a host of A-List stars who were also present at the gig.
